definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

pinyin: fa1 zuo4 xing4 shi4 shui4 bing4

sentences.english: But the onset of dementia invites no ceremony, no grieving.

sentences.english: If you have high blood pressure, you will be more susceptible to a heart attack or stroke.

sentences.english: Also some rests assume the seasonal outbreak, many spring is taken bad in the fall.

sentences.english: In 1923, Harding died of a sudden heart attack.

definition: to recur (of a disease)/to reappear/to relapse (into a former bad state)
old illness recurs (idiom); a relapse/fig. to repeat an old error/the same old problem
